column3: wow I want this one! Actually, this is the approach I am using already in NBitcoin, will test soon.\n
utACK the commit 9f5e40d05970b6b82eb5315073c31f70cde9c0d8.\nI reviewed 232529fbf1af2261085e45407611c32f08d5f6f3 as well, but I don't know enough in C++ to understand the subtleties of the change.\n
Closing in favor of #8589. If #8580 is rejected I could reopen.\n
nit: This is probably better suited as a member method of CTransaction.\n
